member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.InterpolationMode
member.summary: Interpolation algorithms.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.InterpolationMode.Normal
member.summary: Normal interpolation mode.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.InterpolationMode.Fast
member.summary: Fast interpolation mode.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BinarizationMode
member.summary: The binarization algorithm to use.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BinarizationMode.Threshold
member.summary: Applies the fixed threshold for binarization. If the threshold provided is 0, the image is analyzed to automatically compute a threshold for the whole document.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BinarizationMode.Adaptive
member.summary: Performs adaptive binarization. The adaptive binarization determines local thresholds.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.DeskewAdjustmentMode
member.summary: The behavior regarding dimension adjustment for deskew operation.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.DeskewAdjustmentMode.None
member.summary: Do not perform dimensions adjustment. The deskewed image dimensions will be slightly bigger than the original image if a skew angle has been detected. This is the fastest mode, and ensures that all the information on the image is kept.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.DeskewAdjustmentMode.Crop
member.summary: If a skew angle is found, crop the deskewed image so that its dimensions matches the original image's dimensions. This guarantees that the created output document will have the proper dimensions when it's according to a standard (e.g. A4 paper size). Note that if the image contains data very close to the borders, it will be removed by the crop operation.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.DeskewAdjustmentMode.CropIfPossible
member.summary: If a skew angle is found, the image will get cropped later on when running page recognition, only if no zones are detected in the area that will get cropped. This ensure that no data will be lost by cropping, and that the created output document will match original sizing whenever possible.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.DeskewAdjustmentMode.ContentAwareResize
member.summary:
If a skew angle is found, the image will be resized to its original dimensions using a content-aware algorithm. This algorithm ensures that valuable information on the image (like text or graphics) will be kept in priority, which results in mainly "empty" areas being affected.
Note: This adjust mode is slower than the others; for instance, resizing an A4 image at 300 DPI with a moderate skew angle can take a few seconds.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.ExtractImageMethod
member.summary: Whether to convert the images in a PDF document to TIFF or not.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.ExtractImageMethod.Native
member.summary: This method places the OCRed text directly into a copy of the original PDF rather than creating an entirely new PDF.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.ExtractImageMethod.ConvertToTiff
member.summary: The PDF is rasterized to create an image of each page in the PDF.

member.summary: The document will be OCRed using the image extraction method defined by "ExtractImageMethod".

member.summary: The task will terminate with an error.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages
member.summary:
Extended OCR accepts up to 8 recognition languages at a time. This is helpful to process mixed documents but, because of the various character sets, not all combinations are allowed. For this reason, the multiple languages support is limited to a single alphabet. For example, Russian and French can't be mixed.
Note:
Asian languages can't be mixed.
Extended OCR SDK cannot load more than one Asian language at a time.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.English
member.summary: English (American)

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Japanese
member.summary: You will need to have the Asian OCR license to use this language.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Korean
member.summary: You will need to have the Asian OCR license to use this language.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Schinese
member.summary: You will need to have the Asian OCR license to use this language.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Tchinese
member.summary: You will need to have the Asian OCR license to use this language.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.None
member.summary: No language, Latin alphabet

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Hebrew
member.summary: You will need to have the Hebrew OCR license to use this language.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Numeric
member.summary: This language limits recognition to numeric characters.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Arabic
member.summary:
You will need to have the Arabic OCR license to use this language.
Note:
- You need to set to to use Arabic language
- Arabic and English: Works only for Arabic texts with embedded English words. The result for a zone with only English will be empty.

member.name: F:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.SupportedLanguages.Farsi
member.summary:
You will need to have the Arabic OCR license to use this language.
Note:
- You need to set to to use Arabic language
- Arabic and English: Works only for Arabic texts with embedded English words. The result for a zone with only English will be empty.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr
member.summary:
This class configures and performs the Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for the Extended engine.
Note: This class is not thread-safe. It should only be used to process one document and disposed after processing. A new instance must be initialised for each subsequent document that needs to be processed.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.AsianOCREngine
member.summary: Set the Asian OCR engine to use when processing documents with Asian languages. Default is 'OcrAsian1'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.Author
member.summary: Set a custom Author in the output PDF document properties.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.CharactersPerInch
member.summary: The number of characters per inch (cpi) (for fixed text spacing: ).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.CreationDate
member.summary:
Set a custom creation date in the output PDF document properties.
Note: If you are setting the date through the properties.xml, then the date string should be in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EmbedFonts
member.summary:
Set the flag indicating whether to embed fonts in the output PDF document.
Note: It is not recommended to embed fonts because it increases the file size. Unless you have some special needs, it is strongly advised to disable embedding fonts.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableConsoleOutput
member.summary: If enabled then progress messages will be sent to the console. Default is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableCsvOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable CSV file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableDebugOutput
member.summary: If enabled then debug messages will be written to the console output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableDocxOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable DOCX file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableEpubOutput
member.summary:
Enable or disable ePUB file output.
EPUB (short for electronic publication) is an e-book standard by the International Digital Publishing Forum (IDPF). Files have the extension .epub.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableExcelMlOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable ExcelMlOutput file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableHtmlOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable HTML file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableOpenDocumentTextOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable Open document text file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnablePdfOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable PDF file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableRtfOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable RTF file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableTextOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable text file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableWordMlOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable WordMl file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableXlsxOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable XLSX file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EnableXpsOutput
member.summary: Enable or disable XPS file output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.EndPage
member.summary: Sets the last page of the source file that the OCR process will be run to (for a multipage source).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ExtractImageMethod
member.summary: This allows control over the method used to extract images from PDF files for OCR processing. The default value is 'Native'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.GetAdvancedOCRData
member.summary: Set this to to get advanced information (), Character confidence score (.) as well as Word confidence score (.) and Page confidence score (.).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.GetPdfTextTimeout
member.summary: The maximum time (in milliseconds) to check if a PDF document contains text or not.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.HandleExceptionsInternally
member.summary: When set to the OCR object will catch any exceptions for method calls and simply return from the method. The exceptions caught are stored in the property overwriting any previous value.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.IHQCCompression
member.summary:
The IHQC Compression settings to use for PDF and XPS output formats.
Note: You will need to have an IHQC license to use this option.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.Languages
member.summary:
Extended OCR accepts up to 8 recognition languages at a time. This is helpful to process mixed documents but, because of the various character sets, not all combinations are allowed. For this reason, the multiple languages support is limited to a single alphabet. For example, Russian and French can't be mixed.
Note:
Asian languages can't be mixed.
Extended OCR SDK cannot load more than one Asian language at a time.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.Language
member.summary: Select the language to use for OCR processing. This will determine the dictionary that is used. If no language is set by the user, English will be used.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.LanguageDetection
member.summary:
Property that enables or disables the Auto Language Detection feature. The aim of this feature is to detect the most probable language of a single-language page.
If at least one language has been detected, recognition will be performed in the first language candidate that has been detected, and not in the language(s) set through or . If it fails to detect a language, recognition will be performed using the language(s) set through or .
Default is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.LastException
member.summary: Stores last exception caught by the OCR object.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.Layout
member.summary: Select the layout to be used for docx and rtf output. The default value is 'Standard'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.License
member.summary: Specifies the license key.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.LicenseInfo
member.summary:
Gets the current license information.
Note: This needs to be called after setting .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.LimitCharsetCharacters
member.summary:
Use this property to limit the characters to recognize to only the value specified.
Enter a Unicode string that contains the new character set.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.LogFilePath
member.summary:
Gets the path of the log file where output is written to if property is set to .
Note: The value for this property must be accessed after calling .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.LogToFile
member.summary: Set this to if you want to log output to a file. The file will be stored in the TempFolder specified.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ModifiedDate
member.summary:
Set a custom modified date in the output PDF document properties.
Note: If you are setting the date through the properties.xml, then the date string should be in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.NoOcr
member.summary: Set this to if you do not want to OCR the source document. This could be useful if you want to convert a TIFF to an image-only PDF.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.NumberPages
member.summary: Returns the number pages in a document.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.PDFImageCompression
member.summary:
The compression parameters to use for color JPEG images in generated PDFs.
Note: This won't be used if you set to 'Native' because the 'Native' method does not make any changes to the PDF file.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.PdfToImageExtractionTimeout
member.summary: The maximum time (in milliseconds) to take to get image(s) from a PDF page. Default value is 100,000 ms.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.PDFVersion
member.summary:
The PDF version of the resulting output document. The default value is 1.4.
Note: This won't be used if you set to 'Native' because the 'Native' method does not make any changes to the PDF file.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ProcessPageTimeout
member.summary: The maximum time (in milliseconds) to take to process a page (i.e. apply pre-processing and OCR). Default value is 300,000 ms.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadBmpViaFreeImage
member.summary: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.RemoveExistingPDFText
member.summary:
This applies only when a PDF is being used as the source for OCR. When set to this will not include any searchable text that already exists from the source document. Such functionality might be useful if the source document was created by OCR of an image only PDF or other image file and the quality of the text from the previous OCR is poor.
Note: There is no way to distinguish text added as a result of OCR from text added by other means and as a result this option should be used with care.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.RetainBookmarks
member.summary: Retains any bookmarks from the source file in the output when using ..

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.RetainMetadata
member.summary: Retains any metadata from the source file in the output when using ..

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.RetainViewerPreferences
member.summary: Retains any PDF Viewer Preferences, Page Mode and Page Layout from source file in the output when using ..

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.RetainCreationDate
member.summary: Retains the creation date of the source file in the output PDF document properties.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.RetainModifiedDate
member.summary: Retains the modified date of the source file in the output PDF document properties.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.StartPage
member.summary: Sets the first page of the source file where OCR recognition will begin from (for a multi-page source).

member.name: E:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.StatusUpdate
member.summary: This event is raised when processing of a page is complete. The object provides access to information relating to the status of the page processed.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.TextDirection
member.summary: Sets the text direction (for Asian languages only).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.TextSpacing
member.summary:
Sets the text spacing.
Default is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.TextType
member.summary:
Sets the text type.
Default is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ThreadCount
member.summary: The number of worker threads that are used for performing page recognition. Please note that, in order to get the best performance, the number of worker threads need to be set accordingly to your system capabilities. Aquaforest Extended OCR provides an "automatic" mode for balancing the number of work threads based on the system where it is executed. In order to activate this mode, set this value to 0.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.TempFolder
member.summary: The temporary folder used to keep the intermediary processing files.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.UserLexicon
member.summary:
The path to the custom user lexicon file.
Adds a user lexicon to the existing decision environment. This is particularly useful for texts having specific terms.
A user lexicon is a list of words put into a Unicode text file. Each word is separated by either a space, a tab or a carriage return (CR).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ValidatePDFA
member.summary: Whether or not to validate the PDF/A document after conversion ( must be set to a PDF/A version).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.WorkDepth
member.summary:
This property can have values going from 0 to 255 (0 meaning "best speed" and 255 "best accuracy").
Increasing the work depth allows the OCR engine to spend more time on low-quality documents.
The "work depth" indicates how deep the engine is allowed to work in order to find a satisfactory result.
For documents of good quality, the engine will find a satisfactory result at an early stage and there will not be much speed differences between "best speed" and "best accuracy".
For bad quality documents, if allowed by "word depth", the engine will work deeper. The accuracy will be better but at the price of speed.
Default value is 100.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.Version
member.summary: Returns the version of the SDK being used.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Note: This class is not thread-safe. It should only be used to process one document and disposed after processing. A new instance must be initialised for each subsequent document that needs to be processed.

member.summary: Terminates processing.

member.returns: Whether OCR has been successful or not.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadDocumentString
member.summary: Returns a string containing the words from all pages processed.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadPageString(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method will retrieve a string representing the words found for the page requested.
Note: This should be called only after OCR has completed successfully for the page.
member.param: The page number of the page to get the string from.
member.returns: The string containing the words from the specified page.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadPageString(System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
This method will retrieve a string representing the words found for the page requested and in the region specified.
Note: This should be called only after OCR has completed successfully for the page.
member.param: The page number of the page to get the string from.
Region to retrieve string from.
member.returns: The string containing the words from the specified region and page.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadPageWords(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Returns a object representing the words recognised for the page requested.
Note: This should be called only after OCR has completed successfully for the page.
member.param: The page number of the page to get the words from.
member.returns: object representing the words recognised for the page requested.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadPageWords(System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Returns a object representing the words recognised for the page requested and in the region specified.
Note: This should be called only after OCR has completed successfully for the page.
member.param: The page number of the page to get the words from.
Region to retrieve words from.
member.returns: object representing the words recognised for the specified region and page.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.ReadPageLines(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Returns a list of objects, where each object represents a line of recognized text for the page requested.
Note: This should be called only after OCR has completed successfully for the page.
member.param: The page number of the page to get the lines from.
member.returns: A list of object representing the lines recognised for the page requested.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.GetPageImage(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Retrieves the image for the specified page.
Note: Make sure that you call this method before deleting temporary files.
member.param: The page to retrieve the image from.
member.returns: The image for the specified page.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Ocr.GetPageConfidence(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Retrieves the confidence score of the specified page.
Note: must be set to to get the confidence score.
member.param: The page for which to get the confidence score.
member.returns: The confidence score. The confidence score ranges from 0 (best confidence) to 255 (worst confidence).

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor
member.summary: Class containing properties and settings that can be applied to each page image to improve OCR.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.AdvancedDeskew
member.summary: Set advanced deskew settings.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.AdvancedDespeckle
member.summary: Set advanced despeckle settings.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.Autorotate
member.summary: When set to , it will automatically rotate pages so that text flows from left to right. The default value is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.Binarization
member.summary: Set the various binarization settings.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.BlankPageRemoval
member.summary: Set blank page removal settings.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.Deskew
member.summary:
Used to straighten the image. Deskew handles images skewed up to 10 degrees. It doesn't handle higher skew angles. The default value is .
Advanced deskew settings can be set through .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.Despeckle
member.summary:
Removes specks below the specified pixel size from the image. The default value is 0 and the maximum value is 20.
Advanced despeckle settings can be set through .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.ForceTableZones
member.summary: Setting this property to can improve CSV and XLSX output.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.Interpolation
member.summary: Set the interpolation settings.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.KeepOriginalImage
member.summary:
Set this to if you want to use the pre-processed image for OCR but keep the original image in the output document. Default value is .
Note: This property only applies when processing image files or when processing PDF files with set to

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.KeepDeskew
member.summary:
Set this to if you want to use the deskewed image in the output document.
Note: This property only applies when processing image files or when processing PDF files with set to

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.KeepDespeckle
member.summary:
Set this to if you want to use the despeckled image in the output document. This requires the source image to be black and white.
Note: This property only applies when processing image files or when processing PDF files with set to

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.KeepDarkBorderRemoval
member.summary:
Set this to if you want to use the image after dark borders have been removed in the output document.
Note: This property only applies when processing image files or when processing PDF files with set to

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.KeepPunchHoleRemoval
member.summary:
Set this to if you want to use the image after punch holes have been removed in the output document.
Note: This property only applies when processing image files or when processing PDF files with set to

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.LineRemoval
member.summary: Set the various line removal settings.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.NonImagePDF
member.summary: This allows control over the treatment of non image-only PDFs, i.e. PDFs that have some text in them as well as images. The default value for this setting is 'OCR'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageBpp
member.summary:
The Bits Per Pixel to use for the rasterized PDF page when using engine 1. This only applies for documents that are not processed using Native mode.
The default value for this property is taken from the PDF page.
Note: This should only be set with guidance from technical support.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageCompression
member.summary:
The compression to set to the images generated or rasterized from each page of the source PDF file. These images are then OCRed to create the searchable PDF.
The default value for this property is taken from each page in the source PDF file.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageDpi
member.summary:
The DPI to set to the images rasterized from each page of the source PDF file. These images are then OCRed to create the searchable PDF.
The default value for this property is taken from each page in the source PDF file.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageForceVectorCheck
member.summary:
This setting is useful when dealing with documents that contains vector objects (e.g. CAD drawings).
By default, pages that contain only vector objects are rasterized. Pages that do not have any images but contain vector objects as well as electronic text are skipped from rasterization. However, sometimes there can be a page that contains vector objects (CAD drawings) but its title may be in electronic text. To force rasterizing pages like these, set this property to .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageIncludeText
member.summary: When set to this will prevent the conversion of real text (i.e. electronically generated as opposed to text that is part of a scanned image) from being rendered in the page images extracted from the PDF. This is because the text is already searchable and so generally does not require OCR. The value can be set to however if the OCR is required on this real text.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageMaxRes
member.summary: The maximum resolution of the rasterized images. If the resolution retrieved from the PDF page is bigger than this value, it will be set to this value. The default value for this property is 600.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.PdfToImageMinRes
member.summary: The minimum resolution of the rasterized images. If the resolution retrieved from the PDF page is lower than this value, it will be set to this value. The default value for this property is 200.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.RemoveDarkBorders
member.summary:
Removes the dark surrounding from bi-tonal, gray-scale or color images. The dark surrounding of the image is whitened.
Note: The dark border should be touching the edge of the image/page for this to work.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PreProcessor.RemovePunchHoles
member.summary:
Attempts to remove punch holes from pages.
Note: The punch hole algorithm can be used on images with the following minimum dimensions width: 300px, height: 100px (computed for 300 DPI). The minimum height and width can vary with the image resolution.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDespeckle
member.summary: The AdvancedDespeckle class provides advanced image noise reduction features by the image despeckle filter.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDespeckle.RemoveWhitePixels
member.summary: By default, removes black pixels. If this setting is set to , white pixels will be removed instead of black pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDespeckle.SpeckleSize
member.summary: The size of speckles to remove (in pixels). The size of the pixels to remove must be less than 20 pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDespeckle.Dilate
member.summary:
Despeckle removes all the groups of connected pixels with a number of pixels below the parameter. Those connected pixels are not removed if the distance to a larger connected component is below this parameter. As a result only the isolated pixels get deleted. Maximum value for this property is 20 pixels.
The default value is '0'.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization
member.summary: The Binarization class offers image binarization features. Binarization is the first stage in image recognition. It converts the input image into a black and white image for faster processing.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.Binarize
member.summary: Whether or not to perform binarization on the document. The default value is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.Brightness
member.summary:
The brightness threshold (higher values will darker the result).
Enhances the image by increasing/decreasing the luminosity of the image.
The default value is 0.
Note: For this setting to work, needs to be set to .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.Contrast
member.summary:
The contrast threshold (lower values will darker the result).
Enhances the image by increasing/decreasing the difference between image elements and their background.
The default value is 40.
Note: For this setting to work, needs to be set to .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.SmoothingLevel
member.summary: Smoothing may be useful to binarize text with a colored background in order to avoid noisy pixels. (0 disables smoothing, higher values smooths more).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.Threshold
member.summary: Sets the threshold for fixed threshold binarization (0 for automatic threshold computation). The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.Undithering
member.summary:
Whether or not to use automatic undithering while processing a page. NOTE: Automatic undithering will be applied only if smoothing is also activated ()
Dithering is a scanning technique which consists in representing a color or greyscale image using only a limited color palette. This allows to reduce file size while maintaining the general aspect of the image. This technique is known to create images more difficult to handle for OCR technology; this is why specific image preprocessing is needed to detect and revert it.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Binarization.BinarizationMode
member.summary:
The binarization algorithm to use.
Computes a black and white image with the input color/gray-scale image by using the smoothing, brightness, contrast levels and the threshold (for Threshold binarization only) stored in the instance of this class.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BlankPageRemoval
member.summary: This class offers blank page detection and removal features.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BlankPageRemoval.DetectBlankPage
member.summary:
Detect blank pages in the source document. The default is .
Note: This will not remove the blank pages detected. To remove blank pages set to and to .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BlankPageRemoval.RemoveBlankPage
member.summary: Remove blank pages from the output document. Note: You also need to set to . The default value is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BlankPageRemoval.Sensitivity
member.summary: The sensitivity (1 -100) for blank page detection. With high sensitivity, less blank pages are detected. Default value is 1.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.BlankPageRemoval.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Interpolation
member.summary: This class offers image interpolation features.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Interpolation.Interpolate
member.summary: Whether or not to interpolate. Default is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Interpolation.InterpolationMode
member.summary: Set the interpolation mode. Default is 'Normal'.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.Interpolation.TargetResolution
member.summary: Interpolates the source image to the given resolution. This value must be greater than the source image's resolution.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval
member.summary:
LineRemoval class provides line removal capabilities. The class contains algorithms for removing vertical and horizontal lines in an image. The integrator can control various settings in line removal algorithm like:
minimum and maximum line length and thickness of horizontal lines
minimum and maximum line length and thickness of vertical lines
clean noisy pixels adjacent to the line
maximum gap between the lines

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.HorizontalCleanX
member.summary: Cleans noisy pixels attached to horizontal lines. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.HorizontalCleanY
member.summary: Cleans noisy pixels attached to horizontal lines. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.HorizontalDilate
member.summary: Helps with the detection of horizontal lines. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.HorizontalMaxGap
member.summary: The maximum horizontal line gap to close. It is useful to remove broken lines. The default value is 2.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.HorizontalMaxThickness
member.summary: The maximum thickness of horizontal lines to remove. It is useful to keep vertical lines larger than this parameter. Can also be useful to keep vertical letter strokes. The default value is 16.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.HorizontalMinLength
member.summary: The minimum length of horizontal lines to remove. The default value is 128.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.RemoveLines
member.summary:
Whether or not to remove lines from an image. The default value is .
Note: The image must be black and white for this setting to work. If you want to use this setting on a color image then you have to set to .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.VerticalCleanX
member.summary: Cleans noisy pixels attached to vertical lines. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.VerticalCleanY
member.summary: Cleans noisy pixels attached to vertical lines. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.VerticalDilate
member.summary: Helps with the detection of vertical lines. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.VerticalMaxGap
member.summary: The maximum vertical line gap to close. It is useful to remove broken lines. The default value is 2.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.VerticalMaxThickness
member.summary: The maximum thickness of vertical lines to remove. It is useful to keep horizontal lines larger than this parameter. Can also be useful to keep horizontal letter strokes. The default value is 16.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.LineRemoval.VerticalMinLength
member.summary: The minimum length of vertical lines to remove. The default value is 128.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.IHQCCompression
member.summary:
This class manages the intelligent High Quality Compression parameters for PDF(=) and XPS (=) output formats.
Note: IHQCCompression cannot be used when OCRing PDF in Native mode with set to .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.IHQCCompression.EnableIHQCCompression
member.summary: Apply Intelligent High Quality Compression. The default value is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.IHQCCompression.HighResolutionForeground
member.summary: High resolution foreground feature enables a specific mode causing the use of high resolution for the foreground image. HighResolutionForeground enables a specific mode for working around a bug existing in the native readers of some platforms that does not read properly PDF (Mainly the native reader on MAC OS X and IOS). Those native readers do not follow some of the specification of the PDF format. In place of displaying the correct compressed image, they display a down-sampled version of it. This special high resolution foreground mode offers a workaround to customer who wants to use iHQC with these buggy applications. Most of the PDF readers, including Adobe Reader are able to read PDF with IHQC compression properly on any platform.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.IHQCCompression.IHQCCompressionLevel
member.summary:
The compression level to be used. Level 1 is the basic compression level. Level 3 is the most advanced intelligent High Quality Compression mode.
Note: PDF 1.4 A-1a and PDF 1.4 A-1b only supports level 1.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.IHQCCompression.IHQCQualityFactor
member.summary: Set the IHQC quality factor.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PDFImageCompression
member.summary: This class manages the PDF image compression parameters

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PDFImageCompression.EnableJpeg2000Compression
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression. If set to , then the default compression mode is . The default value is .

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PDFImageCompression.Jpeg2000CompressionMode
member.summary: The JPEG 2000 compression mode to use.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PDFImageCompression.Jpeg2000CompressionValue
member.summary: The value to use for the selected compression mode.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.PDFImageCompression.QualityFactor
member.summary:
Gets/Sets the image compression quality factor of color JPEG images in generated PDFs. The default value is 192.
The quality factor determines the degree of loss caused by the compression process. Extended OCR accepts a value from 0 to 255:
255 guarantees the highest image quality
0 guarantees the best compression

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDeskew
member.summary: Use this to defined advanced deskew properties.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDeskew.AdjustmentMode
member.summary: Set the behavior regarding dimension adjustment for deskew operation.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Api.AdvancedDeskew.ForceDeskew
member.summary:
Under certain circumstances, rotating the image to correct its skew angle may decrease the OCR accuracy. The extended engine is able to analyse the image and detect from a OCR accuracy point of view whether it's better to rotate the image or not. Because the skew angle may be visible in the output document (e.g. if is set to ), you can choose to force the deskew to rotate the image, even if it affects the accuracy.
If turned off, the image is analyzed before rotation and the engine may choose not to rotate the image depending on the analysis result.
If turned on, the image is rotated to correct skew angle.
